arabic: اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الَّذِيْ لَا اِلٰهَ اِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّوْمُ
translation: I seek forgiveness of Allah, He who there is no god but He, the Ever living, the subsisting,
from all my oppressions and my sins
and my excesses on my soul,
transliteration: astaghfirullāhal ladhī lā ilāha illā huwal ḥayyul qayyūm
